scripts.dev:setup: cp .env.dev.example .env.dev && echo 'Created .env.dev - please add your API keys!'
scripts.setup: cp .env.example .env && echo 'Created .env - please add your API keys!'
scripts.env:check: node --require dotenv/config -e "console.log('Environment loaded:', {NODE_ENV: process.env.NODE_ENV, OPENAI_KEY: process.env.OPENAI_API_KEY ? 'SET' : 'NOT_SET', STABILITY_KEY: process.env.STABILITY_API_KEY ? 'SET' : 'NOT_SET'})"
scripts.env:check:dev: node --require dotenv/config -e "console.log('Dev Environment loaded:', {NODE_ENV: process.env.NODE_ENV, OPENAI_KEY: process.env.OPENAI_API_KEY ? 'SET' : 'NOT_SET', STABILITY_KEY: process.env.STABILITY_API_KEY ? 'SET' : 'NOT_SET'})" dotenv_config_path=.env.dev
